description: Adam Kantor, accompanied by Gary Sieger on guitar, performs an excerpt from “If I Didn’t Believe in You” from Jason Robert Brown’s musical “The Last Five Years,” at Second Stage Theater.
title: In Performance: Adam Kantor
title_page: In Performance: Adam Kantor - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Stripped of costumes and props, today’s best-known artists from the Broadway stage and Carnegie Hall offer intimate and thrilling performances for the camera.
